decks.notes: The deck revolves around setting up the combo of using Underworld Breach to repeatedly play cards from the graveyard, such as Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble, in order to generate mana and mill cards with Grinding Station. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide card advantage and recursion, while cards like Malevolent Rumble and Unholy Heat can control the board. The goal is to eventually win the game by using Thassa's Oracle to mill yourself out and win on the spot.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Six','','');">Wrenn and Six, along with removal spells like Prismatic Ending and Leyline Binding. The deck also utilizes a toolbox approach with cards like Green Sun's Zenith to search for specific creatures like Endurance and Solitude. By utilizing a mix of powerful threats like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Omnath, Locus of Creation, along with disruption and removal, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast its opponents in a grindy game.

This deck aims to control the game early with ramp and disruption spells, eventually leading to casting powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Emrakul and World Breaker. The deck utilizes a combination of mana ramp, card draw, and removal spells to efficiently cast its large threats and overwhelm the opponent. The Eldrazi creatures provide a strong late-game win condition, while the control elements help to protect them and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck focuses on establishing a powerful board presence and controlling the game until it can win with its high-impact threats.

The deck focuses on a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It also includes spells like Fatal Push and Galvanic Discharge to control the board and protect your creatures. Ocelot Pride and Guide of Souls provide additional support and synergy within the deck. The inclusion of cards like Static Prison and Goblin Bombardment adds disruption and reach to deal with various threats. The deck aims to close out games quickly and efficiently through a combination of creature aggression and burn spells.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Thoughtseize while also utilizing creatures with powerful enter-the-battlefield abilities like Skyclave Apparition and Flickerwisp to control the board. Aether Vial allows for quick creature deployment, and cards like Solitude and Phelia provide removal options. The deck also includes a mix of aggressive creatures like Overlord of the Balemurk and defensive options like Emperor of Bones to apply pressure and protect your own life total. The land base is designed to support the deck's mana requirements efficiently.
